Articles.Content: Im looking for any and all mods that are catered to structural parts. For instance Kommitz just released the Octagonal Truss Set. I LOVE these types of mods and would like to know where I can get more. Now there was one I downloaded not long ago, but just lost it moving around installs. And I cant for the life of me remember the name. It basically replaced all the stock pieces which is currently my goal. Any suggestions?

There is one called "alchemy technology" which add stock parts in many others sizes and one from DailyFrankPeter which add a single "octopuss" stucture (an hollow circle with 4 arms). All available on spaceport. Also spherical/toroidal fuel tanks by Tals add some nice structure parts too.
